hero.description: A modern Next.js v14 starter template featuring authentication, internationalization, theme switching, and shadcn/ui component libraries to kickstart your next web application.
hero.punchline: Fastest start to your new web-app

authentication.title: Authentication & Authorization
authentication.description: Secure your application with NextAuth.js. Support for Credentials and role-based access control.

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.description: Make your app global with next-intl. Support for multiple languages and locales out of the box.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track user behavior and performance with Vercel Analytics. Real-time insights and reporting.

themes.title: Theme Switching
themes.description: Toggle between light and dark modes seamlessly. Supports system preferences and user choice

components.title: Component Library
components.description: Beautiful, accessible components from shadcn/ui. Customizable and ready to use.

free.title: Free
free.description: Open-source and free to use. Get started with your new project today.

Index.title: Home
Index.description: Discover the amazing features of our application.
Index.secret: Secret page for logged in users

Feedback.title: Send Feedback
Feedback.description: We value your input! Let us know what you think about our product.
Feedback.name: Name
Feedback.error: {error, select, CredentialsFeedback {Invalid name or email} other {Unknown error}}

Login.title: Login
Login.error: {error, select, CredentialsSignin {Invalid username or password} other {Unknown error}}
Login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account
Login.notAdmin: You need administrator privileges to access this page.

Management.title: User Management
Management.description: Manage your users and send invitations.

Modify.title: Are you sure?
Modify.description: This will update the user's status.

Invite.title: Invite User
Invite.description: Send an invitation email to add a new user to the system.

Modify.title: Delete invitation
Modify.description: This will permanently delete the invitation. This action cannot be undone.
